overview:
Sainath Gupta, CEO of Bajarangâ€™s Industries has long working experience in the Indian industrial sector & is primarily a technologist and an entrepreneur, educator, green evangelist.

He is passionate about bringing new products from ideatation to Profit with optimum utilization of resources.

During his bachelors, He has won several national level prizes in Robotics, Hacking, Paper presentation & business plan presentations from very prestigious institutes like IIT, IIIT-H, OU, SNIST & CBIT.

He plays and closely follows Adventure Sports, Golf & Swimming.
